content:
hello, contributors! :wave:

let's meet up and chat about/coordinate on things we're working on! Here's a when2meet so we can find a time:

https://www.when2meet.com/?20809700-1itKn
oops, I totally forgot to confirm the schedule for this last one in the middle of being sick for so long...sorry about that! :sweat_smile:
here's a new one for September! https://www.when2meet.com/?21162985-uPXwD
currently we have 2 responses for :point_up: - any other takers before we pick a time? :big_smile:
ok cool! Let's go with 2023-09-12T15:00:00-04:00 - see you tomorrow at https://meet.jit.si/roc-contributor-chat everyone! :smiley:
Wifi was struggling a bit for me, which is ok as I didn't have much I needed to say. Thanks for the update :smile:

Follow up related to my comments on random number generation. I decided to to look into what is used by abseil (the Google library). They have a smart trick. Use the AES acceleration hardware to be about the same speed as PCG while still being attack resistant. Pretty cool idea as long as always running on hardware with AES acceleration (which is most modern hardware).

In the paper on Randen, they comment on PCG and xoroshiro. PCG they think is fine, just not attack resistant (though maybe modifications could at least make it ok). Xoroshiro is easily distinguishable from random. Not sure if that fully applies to xoshiro (the newest variant), but I think it still does from some other reading.

here's a when2meet for a contributor coordination chat in November!

https://www.when2meet.com/?22191437-e6pOd

I assume the last few days in November won't work for US people because of the Thanksgiving holiday, but presumably we can find a day/time that works earlier than that :big_smile:

it looks like there's no overlap between times that work for both @Isaac Van Doren and @Ayaz Hafiz - any chance either of you have more availability that opened up since the when2meet started? :sweat_smile:
I cant see what times Isaac put down but feel free to schedule whenever and Ill do my best to make it

It looks like many of the other popular times are during working hours for me. In general I am most available in the evening after 4PM CST and more on weekends. It's alright if I can't make it to this one.
ok fair enough! Let's do this one at 2023-11-15T15:00:00-05:00
video link will be https://meet.jit.si/roc-contributor-chat as usual!
Starting soon?
Sorry I was late btw, I planned the right amount of time for my dog walk but then I ended up needing to fix something important for my sister.
no worries!

Here's a when2meet for a contributor coordination chat in Feb.

https://www.when2meet.com/?22945922-cq2w7
Ok, let's lock in 2024-02-04T06:00:00+11:00 for the next coord meeting :smiley: please add this date to your calendars.

thanks for organizing, Luke! :smiley:

btw if anyone hasn't been to one of these before, anyone's welcome to attend - feel free to drop in if you like!
Just giving this a bump, in case anyone missed it -- this is less than 1 week. :smile: All welcome
8 hrs to go. See you all soon :working_on_it:
https://meet.jit.si/roc-contributor-chat
:point_up: starting now! Anyone is welcome to join :smiley:
Roc Contributors March 2024 link for when2meet, please add your availability. :smiley:
Bump - can I please have a few more people to add their availability?
